inclusion.criterion: chronic kidney disease (CKD) scheduled for coronary
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: and/or peripheral angiography and/or angioplasty with an eGFR <45 ml/min/1.73 m2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At high risk for CI-AKI according to Mehran's score ≥11 and/or Gurm's score >7
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current enrolment in any other study when enrolment in the REMEDIAL III would involve deviation from either protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms and normal blood chemistry. He has CKD scheduled for coronary angiography.
